amendment.description: Amendment requires the Boxing Commission to establish guidelines for rating boxers; these guidelines must be followed by organizations that sanction boxing events.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in part B of House Report 109-295 to require the Boxing Commission to establish guidelines for rating boxers which must be followed by organizations that sanction boxing events.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Schakowsky.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
